stanza.line: How can I then return in happy (a)plight(/a)
That am debarred the benefit of (b)rest(/b)
When day's oppression is not eased by (a)night(/a)
But day by night and night by day (b)oppressed(/b)
Do in consent shake hands to torture (d)me(/d)
The one by toil the other to (c)complain(/c)
How far I toil still farther off from (d)thee(/d)
I tell the day to please him thou art (e)bright(/e)
And dost him grace when clouds do blot the (f)heaven(/f)
When sparkling stars twire not thou gild'st the (f)even(/f)
But day doth daily draw my sorrows (g)longer(/g)
And night doth nightly make grief's length seem (g)stronger(/g)
